name: Makeover! Fashion Dress Salon
description:
Would you like to be the next cover of a top model fashion and glamour magazine? Do you think you can be the new clothing supermodel and become a real superstar? Now it is your time to start practicing your outfit design skills in this amazing stylish clothes salon! Become a makeover star and learn all the secrets of the catwalk. Enjoy the life of a designer!

Come to the Stylish clothes salon to discover what a real fashion top model is about! You will learn the secrets of a fashion makeover and have the chance of designing stylish clothes for your models! Get the most out of the fashion and makeover levels you can complete. Enjoy the top model salon and show of your skills creating the most fashionable and stylish clothes for the catwalk!

Features:
- Become the next top model and fashion makeover designer in this salon!
- Enjoy the stylish clothes salon and create the most awesome designs!
- Dress your models with the best clothes for the catwalk!
- Take pictures of the fashion clothes, the stylish makeover creations and the fashion models!
- Share your top model and designer achievements with friends and family!

Are you ready to become the next star designer? Prepare an awesome fashion top model makeover and create the most amazing stylish clothes in this salon! Play now!
